titles.title: I Am The Resurrection, I Am The Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I am the resurrection, I am the life.
He that believeth in me, though he were dead,
Yet shall he live. I am the resurrection and the life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I speak it to my body, speak it to my soul,
When sin and death lay outside my door.
Speak it to disease, suffering and pain,
Deny this realm for I am the gain.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Don't believe my feelings, symptoms or facts,
Tempting voices stirring up doubts.
I'll yield to His Spirit,
The Great I Am within,
Resurrected, quickening change in this life.
